degree.title: Degree Recognition Checker - MiGreat Germany
degree.heading: Degree Recognition Checker
degree.subheading: Check if your degree is recognized in Germany
degree.result.fully.title: Great! Your university and degree are fully recognized.
degree.result.fully.message: Take our get started survey to see how you can apply to work in Germany.
degree.result.university.title: Great! Your university is fully recognized.
degree.result.university.message: Your specific degree is not listed, but we can help you apply for individual degree recognition. Take our get started survey to see how you can apply to work in Germany.
degree.result.manual.title: Your degree is not pre-approved by Germany
degree.result.manual.message: But we can help you apply for manual recognition. Take our survey and we will help you take the right steps to get an answer soon and start your journey!
degree.info.heading: About Degree Recognition
degree.info.text: This tool checks the official anabin database maintained by the German government. Recognition status can affect your visa eligibility and job prospects in Germany. All rights and final decisions remain with KMK. Find more info at
